original_text: For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: happy shalt thou be, and it shall be well with thee.
korean_text: 네가 네 손이 수고한 대로 먹을 것이라 네가 복되고 형통하리로다

sentences.original_text: For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 손의 수고한 것을 먹을 것이니

sentences.original_text: and it shall be well with thee
